tasks.build:ui: cd web && yarn && yarn run build
tasks.compile:mac64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o bin/midi-control-darwin-aarch64 main.ts
tasks.compile:mac86: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o bin/midi-control-darwin-x86_64 main.ts
tasks.compile:linux86: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/midi-control-linux-x86_64 main.ts
tasks.compile:linux64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/midi-control-linux-aarch64 main.ts
tasks.compile:win64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o bin/midi-control-windows-x86_64.exe main.ts
tasks.bump: deno run -A jsr:@kellnerd/bump --file=web/package.json && deno run -A jsr:@kellnerd/bump --tag=v --commit='Release: '
